About RegExp Download Organizer

Transform your chaotic Downloads folder into an organized file system with intelligent rules. This extension uses powerful regular expressions to automatically sort downloads into meaningful directory structures.

Features

  • Pattern matching with regex
  • Dynamic folder creation
  • Date-based organization
  • Drag & drop rule ordering
  • Real-time rule validation
